newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila Central Banks drops term rates to 9.9 pct.
newsitem.headline: Manila Central Banks drops term rates to 9.9 pct.

text.p: The Philippine Central Bank said on Wednesday it dropped its borrowing rates on term-reverse repos after adjusting its overnight rates.
Its rates on one-month and two-month term-reverse repos have been trimmed to 9.9 from 10 percent each, the bank said.
The Central Bank also started offering the five-day term reverse repos at 9.9 percent.
Earlier on Wednesday, the Central Bank said it lowered its overnight borrowing rate to 9.9 from 10.0 percent and its overnight lending rate to 12.65 percent from 12.75 percent.
